english.segment1: Im in the mood for a breakdown. A slowing down of all the things in my mind. That keep on trying to figure out how to pin you down
english.segment2: In desperate need of a shakedown. A blowing down of all the ways that I try. To talk you into a corner until you look like me
english.segment3: But when I finally see what you see. Theres a symphony. I hear a symphony
english.segment4: Words cannot define. What it means to be. In your symphony. In your symphony
english.segment5: A long awaited let down. A burning through thats calling me back to you. With a beautiful melody of all you love
english.segment6: Its welling deep inside of me, Its springing out, the song that Im meant to sing. So teach me the harmony to all you love
english.segment7: Hearts in unison. Im drawn into your love. Hearts in unison. I understand your love
